api_token.description: To access models on Instill Core/Cloud, enter your Instill Core/Cloud API Token. You can find your tokens by visiting your Console's Settings > API Tokens page.
api_token.title: API Token

server_url.description: Base URL for the Instill Cloud API. To access models on Instill Cloud, use the base URL `https://api.instill.tech`. To access models on your local Instill Core, use the base URL `http://api-gateway:8080`.
server_url.title: Server URL
